TopicTitle: Comment on the avatar, signature, and/or the location of the user above you!

Articles.Content:
Here's how it works:

User A: I like the fact that a picture of jebediah is your avatar!

User B: It's a shame your signature links to one of the most hated fan bases on the internet.

User C: Good thing it's worse than your location of Beijing. AFAIK you can't access these forums in China.

You get the idea. Next user, comment on my avatar, signature, and location.

Ok then...

Look at the signature, avatar and location...

You are strangely obsessed with people stuck in mud...

Crap Avatar.

Crap Sig.

Crap name.

Location... k.

Signature... meh, I got at least 3 times more.

Avatar... .. . it's kinda nice. It's some PokÃƒÂ©mon, isn't it? I don't know much about that, but that thing's pretty nice.

Bad name. Avatar isn't very funny.

However........Dat Sig......Rule breaker!!!!!

Edited July 26, 2014 by Souper

Venera, usual. Signature, italics and bolded. Location on Venus, nothing special.

10/100/100/1000/10000/100000

Apocalyptic magic cyberhorse.
Ministry of Peace winged horse, some place that has a long name and an exclamation points, and a person with glasses. That's an unusual combo.
Obsessed with ..... well, 3 words I can't say without starting a forum war which would eventually escalate into WW3.
I've never seen you before on this forum.

Weird avatar.

...

Do you have some kind of fetish with mud and feet?

Wait a second, you're a kraken!

Lol your avatar.

Mud.

Mud.

Mud.

You also think that just saying "My Little Pony" will start WW3, but trust me, we are NOT on 4chan or Youtube.

You also think that just saying "My Little Pony" will start WW3, but trust me, we are NOT on 4chan or Youtube.

It's only a matter of time before Google + (more like Google -) takes over the internet. Then those 3 words would start a war.
